授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to gain communication strategies that can be used in and out of class and practice making presentations in English.
到達目標: The students will acquire discussion, debate, and critical thinking skills, and they will also learn how to make effective presentations in English.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
